title: Keats House Poets Present…Rishi Dastidar and Stephanie Turner
desc: A relaxed afternoon of poetry and spoken word, with an open mic and performances from our headline poets. Stephanie Turner is a London-based poet, social artist and creative facilitator and has recently published a collection of bee poems,  Have You Heard The Buzz?  Rishi Dastidar?s poetry has been published by the  Financial Times , Tate Modern and the Southbank Centre amongst many others, and was most recently in  Ten: The New Wave  (Bloodaxe, 2014). He was part of the 2014-15 Rialto / Poetry School editorial development programme, and also serves as a trustee of Spread The Word. Unfortunately Karen McCarthy Woolfe will no longer be performing at this event. Free, booking required
